text: The AVN Adult Entertainment Expo (AEE) is an adult entertainment and pornography convention trade show. It is sponsored by the AVN magazine. The expo is held at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, United States. The first expo was in 1998 and is held every January. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:Sex industry Category:Pornography Category:Las Vegas Category:1998 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in Nevada
title: AVN Adult Entertainment Expo
